0.0.1.name: wordpress/buddypress-jquery-activity-stream-widget
0.0.1.description:
Widgetize your BP activity streams!


Let your site viewers/users easily read the activity streams by adding a simple yet customizable widget that displays streams in an animated manner.

Users can:

  • Enter desired animation speed
  • Enter desired animation timeouts
  • User can select from two effects (Slide and Fade). Will be adding more soon!
  • Customize widget area height

Note: This plugin works with buddypress installed on your website.
